text: Enrique Peñalosa Londoño (born 30 September 1954) is a Colombian politician. He was mayor of Bogotá from 1998 until 2001 and elected again in 2015, with his term finishing in 2019. He has also worked as a journalist. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Bogotá Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:Colombian journalists
title: Enrique Peñalosa
